description: Log request and response data to Syslog.

successful_severity.description: An optional logging severity assigned to the all successful requests with response status code less then 400.

client_errors_severity.description: An optional logging severity assigned to the all failed requests with response status code 400 or higher but less than 500.

server_errors_severity.description: An optional logging severity assigned to the all failed requests with response status code 500 or higher.

log_level.description: An optional logging severity, any request with equal or higher severity will be logged to System log.
